analyzed: majjhima nikāya
sacca vibhaṅga sutta
evam me suta

bhikkhavaḥ ti

bhagavān etat avoca

analyzed: tathāgatena bhikkhave arahatā sammāsambuddhena bārāṇasiyam isipatane migadāye

analyzed: dukkhassa ariya saccassa ācikkhanā desanā paññāpanā paṭṭhapanā vivaraṇā vibhajanā

seyyathā api bhikkhave janetā evam sāriputto
sā iyyathā api jātassa āpādetā evam moggallānaḥ

original: Sāriputto, bhikkhave, sotāpattiphale vineti, moggallāno uttamatthe.
analyzed: sāriputtaḥ bhikkhave sotāpatti phale vineti moggallānaḥ uttama tthe

original: Sāriputto, bhikkhave, pahoti cattāri ariyasaccāni vitthārena ācikkhituṁ desetuṁ paññāpetuṁ paṭṭhapetuṁ vivarituṁ vibhajituṁ uttānīkātun”ti.

idam avoca bhagavān

analyzed: idam vatvāna sugataḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā vihāram pāvisi

analyzed: dukkhassa ariya saccassa ācikkhanā desanā paññāpanā paṭṭhapanā vivaraṇā vibhajanā

analyzed: paññāpanā paṭṭhapanā vivaraṇā vibhajanā uttānīkamma dukkha nirodha gāminiyā paṭipadāya

original: ariyasaccassa ācikkhanā desanā paññāpanā paṭṭhapanā vivaraṇā vibhajanā uttānīkammaṁ.
analyzed: ariya saccassa ācikkhanā desanā paññāpanā paṭṭhapanā vivaraṇā vibhajanā uttānīkamma
katamat ca āvuso dukkham ariya sat ca

original: Jātipi dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, maraṇampi dukkhaṁ, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsāpi dukkhā, yampicchaṁ na labhati tampi dukkhaṁ; saṅkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā.
analyzed: jāti api dukkhā jarā api dukkhā maraṇam api dukkha soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā api dukkhā yam piccham na labhati tam pi dukkha saṅkhittena pañca upādāna khandhāḥ dukkhāḥ
katamā ca avusaḥ jāti

original: Yā tesaṁ tesaṁ sattānaṁ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jāti sañjāti okkanti abhinibbatti khandhānaṁ pātubhāvo āyatanānaṁ paṭilābho,
analyzed: yā tesam tesam sattānam tamhi tamhi satta nikāye jāti sañjāti okkanti abhinibbatti khandhānam pātubhāvaḥ āyatanānam paṭilābhaḥ
ayam vuccati avuso jāti
katamā ca avusaḥ jarā

original: Yā tesaṁ tesaṁ sattānaṁ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jarā jīraṇatā khaṇḍiccaṁ pāliccaṁ valittacatā āyuno saṁhāni indriyānaṁ paripāko,
analyzed: yā tesam tesam sattānam tamhi tamhi satta nikāye jarā jīraṇa tā khaṇḍiccam pāliccam valittaca tā āyuno sahāni indriyānam paripākaḥ
ayam vuccati avuso jarā
katamat ca avusaḥ maraṇa

original: Yā tesaṁ tesaṁ sattānaṁ tamhā tamhā sattanikāyā cuti cavanatā bhedo antaradhānaṁ maccu maraṇaṁ kālaṅkiriyā khandhānaṁ bhedo kaḷevarassa nikkhepo jīvitindriyassupacchedo,
analyzed: yā tesam tesam sattānam tamhā tamhā satta nikāyā cuti cavana tā bhedaḥ antaradhānam maccu maraṇam kālaṅkiriyā khandhānam bhedaḥ kaḷevarassa nikkhepaḥ jīvitindriyassa upacchedo
idam vuccati avuso maraṇa
katamaḥ ca āvuso sokaḥ

original: Yo kho, āvuso, aññataraññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa soko socanā socitattaṁ antosoko antoparisoko,
analyzed: yaḥ kho āvuso aññatara aññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa aññatara aññatarena dukkha dhammena phuṭṭhassa sokaḥ socanā socitattam antosokaḥ antoparisoko
ayam vuccati avuso sokaḥ
katamaḥ ca āvuso paridevaḥ

original: Yo kho, āvuso, aññataraññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa ādevo paridevo ādevanā paridevanā ādevitattaṁ paridevitattaṁ,
analyzed: yaḥ kho āvuso aññatara aññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa aññatara aññatarena dukkha dhammena phuṭṭhassa ādevaḥ paridevaḥ ādevanā paridevanā ādevitattam paridevitatta
ayam vuccati āvuso paridevaḥ
katamat ca āvuso

original: Yaṁ kho, āvuso, kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ kāyikaṁ asātaṁ kāyasamphassajaṁ dukkhaṁ asātaṁ vedayitaṁ,
analyzed: yam kho āvuso kāyikam dukkham kāyikam asātam kāya samphassa jam dukkham asātam vedayita
idam vuccati āvuso
kataman ca āvuso domanassa

original: Yaṁ kho, āvuso, cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ cetasikaṁ asātaṁ manosamphassajaṁ dukkhaṁ asātaṁ vedayitaṁ,
analyzed: yam kho āvuso cetasikam dukkham cetasikam asātam manaḥ samphassa jam dukkham asātam vedayita
idam vuccati āvuso domanassa
katamaḥ ca āvuso upāyāsaḥ

original: Yo kho, āvuso, aññataraññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa āyāso upāyāso āyāsitattaṁ upāyāsitattaṁ,
analyzed: yaḥ kho āvuso aññatara aññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa aññatara aññatarena dukkha dhammena phuṭṭhassa āyāsaḥ upāyāsaḥ āyāsitattam upāyāsitatta
ayam vuccati avuso upāyāsaḥ

original: Katamañcāvuso, yampicchaṁ na labhati tampi dukkhaṁ?
analyzed: katamat ca āvuso yam piccham na labhati tam pi dukkha

original: Jātidhammānaṁ, āvuso, sattānaṁ evaṁ icchā uppajjati:
analyzed: jāti dhammānaṃ āvuso sattānam evam icchā uppajjati

original: ‘aho vata mayaṁ na jātidhammā assāma; na ca vata no jāti āgaccheyyā’ti.
analyzed: aho vata mayam na jāti dhammāḥ assāma na ca vata naḥ jāti āgaccheyya ati
na kho pana itam icchāya pattabba
idam pi yam piccham na labhati tam pi
jarā dhammānaḥ āvuso sattānam pe
byādhi dhammānaḥ āvuso sattānam
maraṇa dhammānaḥ āvuso sattānam
soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsa dhammānaṃ āvuso sattānam evam icchā uppajjati

original: ‘aho vata mayaṁ na sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadhammā assāma; na ca vata no sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā āgaccheyyun’ti.
analyzed: aho vata mayam na soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsa dhammāḥ assāma na ca vata no soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsāḥ āgaccheyyunti
na kho pana itam icchāya pattabba
idam pi yam piccham na labhati tam pi
katame ca āvuso saṅkhittena pañca upādānakkhandhāḥ dukkhā
seyyathidaṃ rūpa upādānakkhandhaḥ vedanupādānakkhandhaḥ saññu pādānakkhandhaḥ saṅkhāru pādānakkhandhaḥ viññāṇupādānakkhandhaḥ
ime vuccanti āvuso saṅkhittena pañca upādānakkhandhāḥ dukkhā
idam vuccati āvuso dukkham ariya sat ca
kataman ca āvuso dukkha samudayam ariya sat ca

original: Yāyaṁ taṇhā ponobbhavikā nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: yā ayam taṇhā ponobbhavikā nandī rāga sahagatā tatra tatra abhinandinī
kāma taṇhā bhava taṇhā vibhava taṇhā
idam vuccati āvuso dukkha samudayam ariya sat ca
kataman ca āvuso dukkha nirodham ariya sat ca

original: Yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo,
analyzed: yaḥ tassāya eva taṇhāya asesa virāga nirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo
idam vuccati āvuso dukkha nirodham ariya sacca
katamat ca āvuso dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ariya sat ca
ayam eva ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo

original: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.
analyzed: sammā diṭṭhi sammā saṅkappo sammā vācā sammā kammanto sammā ājīvaḥ sammā vāyāmaḥ sammā sati sammā samādhi
katamā ca āvuso sammādiṭṭhi

original: Yaṁ kho, āvuso, dukkhe ñāṇaṁ, dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṁ, dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṁ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṁ,
analyzed: yam kho āvuso dukkhe ñāṇa dukkha samudaye ñāṇa dukkha nirodhe ñāṇa dukkha nirodha gāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇa
ayam vuccati āvuso sammādiṭṭhi
katamaḥ ca āvuso sammāsaṅkappo
nekkhamma saṅkappo a byāpāda saṅkappo a vihisā saṅkappo
ayam vuccati āvuso sammāsaṅkappo
katamā ca āvuso sammāvācā

original: Musāvādā veramaṇī, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī, samphappalāpā veramaṇī,
analyzed: musāvādā veramaṇī pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī samphappalāpā veramaṇī
ayam vuccati āvuso sammā vācā
katamaḥ ca āvuso sammākammanto

original: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī, adinnādānā veramaṇī, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī,
analyzed: pāṇa atipātā veramaṇī adinna ādānā veramaṇī kāmesumicchā ācārā veramaṇī
ayam vuccati āvuso sammākammanto
katamaḥ ca āvuso sammāājīvo

original: Idhāvuso, ariyasāvako micchāājīvaṁ pahāya sammāājīvena jīvikaṁ kappeti,
analyzed: idha āvuso ariya sāvakaḥ micchāājīvam pahāya sammāājīvena jīvikam kappeti
ayam vuccati āvuso sammāājīvo
katamaḥ ca āvuso sammāvāyāmaḥ

original: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati,
analyzed: idha āvuso bhikkhu anuppannānam pāpakānam akusalānam dhammānam anuppādāya chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati

original: uppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati,
analyzed: uppannānam pāpakānam akusalānam dhammānam pahānāya chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati

original: anuppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati,
analyzed: anuppannānam kusalānam dhammānam uppādāya chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati

original: uppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati,
analyzed: uppannānam kusalānam dhammānam ṭhitiyāḥ asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati
ayam vuccati āvuso sammāvāyāmaḥ
katamā ca āvuso sammā asati

original: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
analyzed: idha āvuso bhikkhu kāye kāya anupassī viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa
vedanāsu vedanā anupassī viharati pe
citte citta anupassī viharati

original: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ,
analyzed: dhammesu dhamma anupassī viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa
ayam vuccati avuso sammā sati
katamaḥ ca āvuso sammāsamādhi

original: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati,
analyzed: idha āvuso bhikkhu vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi sa vitakkam sa vicāram viveka jam pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati,
analyzed: vitakka vicārānam vūpasamāḥ ajjhattam sampasādanam cetasaḥ eka udi bhāvam a vitakkam a vicāram samādhi jam pīti sukham dutiyam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe…
analyzed: pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati pe tatiyam jhānam pe
catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati
ayam vuccati āvuso sammāsamādhi
idam vuccati āvuso dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ariya sacca

original: Tathāgatenāvuso, arahatā sammāsambuddhena bārāṇasiyaṁ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṁ
analyzed: tathāgatena āvuso arahatā sammāsambuddhena bārāṇasiyam isipatane migadāye anuttara

original: dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena
analyzed: dhamma cakkam pavattitam appaṭivattiyam samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena

original: vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṁ, yadidaṁ—
analyzed: vā brahmunā vā kenacid vā

original: imesaṁ catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ ācikkhanā desanā paññāpanā paṭṭhapanā vivaraṇā vibhajanā uttānīkamman”ti.
analyzed: imesam catunnam ariya saccānam ācikkhanā desanā paññāpanā paṭṭhapanā vivaraṇā vibhajanā uttānīkammanti
idam avocaḥ āyasmā sāriputto

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū āyasmataḥ sāriputtassa bhāsitam abhinandunti
saccavibhaṅga suttam niṭṭhitam ekādasama
